pages.text: The Volt Cell is a device capable of producing $(thing)electric charge$(0) using a chemical effect within bottles of $(#9d1e2d)Acid$(0).$(p)$(o)Trying to craft a bottle of Acid? Remember, you can shift-click on ingredients in this book to see how they're made!

Aside from damaging Creatures that pass on top of it, placing it below a Crucible charges it with $(thing)Electricity$(0). Using this stimulus, new and important kinds of Reactions can surely be observed!
